fields.name: RPN
fields.description: Distributed Memory Interface Unit Register Page Number (within its NRR)

fields.name: NRRI
fields.description: Identifier of the Ncore 3 Register Region in which this DMIU resides

fields.name: NUnitId
fields.description: Ncore 3 Unit identifier

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: Value of 1 validates this register. This bit is set to 1 if the DMIU is implemented

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: Fabric Unit Identifier of the unit

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: TransActv
fields.description: This bit is set when there is one or more active transactions inside the DMIU

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ProtErrDetEn
fields.description: AXI downstream protocol error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the downstream AXI interface.

fields.name: TransErrDetEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the Concerto Transport.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ProtErrIntEn
fields.description: Downstream AXI uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: TransErrIntEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: MemErrIntEn
fields.description: RAM memory uncorrectable error interrupt enable.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: This field indicates the logged error type

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: This field indicates additional information about logged error

fields.name: ErrEntry
fields.description: This field indicates the entry or the set in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUUESAR
registers.description: DMIU Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU Uncorrectable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xUESR

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xUESR

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xUESR

fields.name: ErrDetEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, then correctable error detection and logging is enabled; otherwise, correctable error detection and logging is disabled.

fields.name: ErrIntEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted when the number of correctable errors corrected equals the value in ErrThreshold field; otherwise, the correctable error interrupt signal is never asserted.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrThreshold
fields.description: This field determines the number of correctable errors that must be corrected before the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted.

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: This bit indicates that the number of correctable errors detected by the unit overflowed the Correctable Error Count field

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: This field indicates the number of correctable errors detected by the unit. The field stops incrementing if the Correctable Error Count Overflow bit is set

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: This field indicates the logged error type

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: This field indicates additional information about logged error

fields.name: ErrEntry
fields.description: This field indicates the entry or the set in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word in which the logged error was detected

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUCESAR
registers.description: DMIU Correctable Error Status Alias Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU Correctable Error Status Alias Register

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid filed of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: Alias bit for ssetting Error Count Overflow field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: Alias field for setting error Count field of xCESR

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting errro info field of xCESR

fields.name: ResThreshold
fields.description: Threshold for the uncorrectable error indication to the functional safety controller.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCTCR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Transaction Control Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Transaction Control Register

fields.name: LookupEn
fields.description: This bit enables system memory cache.

fields.name: AllocEn
fields.description: This bit enables allocation into system memory cache.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCTAR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Transaction Activity Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Transaction Activity Register

fields.name: EvictActive
fields.description: This bit is set when the unit is performing any system memory cache eviction activity and is cleared otherwise

fields.name: AllocActive
fields.description: This bit is set when the unit is performing any system memory cache allocation activity and is cleared otherwise.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCAPR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Allocation Policy Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Allocation Policy Register

fields.name: TOFAllocDisable
fields.description: This bit disables cache allocation for writeUnique from CHI/ACE processors

fields.name: ClnWrAllocDisable
fields.description: This bit disables cache allocation for clean writes

fields.name: DtyWrAllocDisable
fields.description: This bit disables cache allocation for dirty writes

fields.name: RdAllocDisable
fields.description: This bit disables cache allocation for reads

fields.name: WrAllocDisable
fields.description: This bit disables cache allocation for writes

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCMCR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Control Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Control Register

fields.name: MntOp
fields.description:
This field encodes the cache maintenance operation to be performed:
0x0: Initialize all Entries
0x1-0x3: Reserved
0x4: Flush All Entries
0x5: Flush Entry at Set and Way
0x6: Flush Entry at Address
0x7: Flush Address Range
0x8: Flush Set Way Range
0x9-0xB: Reserved
0xC: Debug Read Entry at set, way, and word
0xD: Reserved
0xE: Debug Write Entry at set, way, and word
0xF: Reserved

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ArrayID
fields.description:
This field selects the array on which the cache maintenance operation is to be performed:
  0x00: Tag Array 
  0x01: Data Array
  0x02-0x3F: Reserved

fields.name: SecAttr
fields.description:
This bit indicates the value of the security attribute of the address for the cache maintenance operation is to be performed. 
If the cache maintenance operation does not operate on an address, the value of this bit should be zero.

fields.name: Rsvd2
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCMAR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Activity Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Activity Register

fields.name: MntOpActv
fields.description: This bit is set when any cache maintenance operation is in progress and is clear otherwise

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

registers.name: DMIUSMCMLR0
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 0
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 0

fields.name: MntSet
fields.description: The field indicates the set on which the maintenance operation is to be performed

fields.name: MntWay
fields.description: This field indicates the way on which the maintenance operation is to be performed.

fields.name: MntWord
fields.description: This field indicates the data word on which the maintenance operation is to be performed.

registers.name: DMIUSMCMLR1
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 1
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Location Register 1

fields.name: MntAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the address on which the maintenance operation is to be performed

fields.name: MntRange
fields.description:
This field indicates the range for flush operations in number of cache lines.
This field is used when doing flushes based on address or set/way range.

registers.name: DMIUSMCMDR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Data Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Maintenance Data Register

fields.name: MntData
fields.description: This field contains the data resulting from a maintenance read operation or the data to be used for a maintenance write operation.

fields.name: Mask
fields.description:
Treated as binary number from 0 to 15.
Actuall bit mast covers (Mask + 20) bits of address, with a maximum of 35 bits.
This enable a block of up to 2^(Mask + 20) bytes to be relocated.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description:
0: Address translation triplet does not have a valid translation
1: Address translation triplet has a valid translation and translation is enabled

fields.name: Mask
fields.description:
Treated as binary number from 0 to 15.
Actuall bit mast covers (Mask + 20) bits of address, with a maximum of 35 bits.
This enable a block of up to 2^(Mask + 20) bytes to be relocated.

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description:
0: Address translation triplet does not have a valid translation
1: Address translation triplet has a valid translation and translation is enabled

fields.name: FromAddr
fields.description: Bits 51 down to 20 of incoming address.

fields.name: FromAddr
fields.description: Bits 51 down to 20 of incoming address.

fields.name: ToAddr
fields.description: Bits 51 down to 20 of outgoing address.

fields.name: ToAddr
fields.description: Bits 51 down to 20 of outgoing address.

fields.name: EngVerId
fields.description: Engineering Version Identifier

registers.name: DMIUSMCIFR
registers.description: DMIU System Memory Cache Information Register
registers.csrDescription: DMIU System Memory Cache Information Register

fields.name: NumSet
fields.description: This field indicates the number of sets in the system memory cache minus one in this DMIU. To determine the total number of sets in the system memory cache, this value must be multiplied by the number of DMIUs that implement the system memory cache

fields.name: NumWay
fields.description: This field indicates the number of ways(i.e. the associativity) minus one in the system memory cache

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: ImplVer
fields.description: Implementation Version

fields.name: UT
fields.description: Unit Type

fields.name: AE
fields.description: Atomic Engine Present

fields.name: SMC
fields.description: System Memory Cache Present

fields.name: Rsvd1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: Implemented
